# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and add value to your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and utility, the product is worth $10,000 to you. Considering its immense value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a substantial saving of $500 compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you better. Kind regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
